name: Utari-Room
description: Final Year Project - UTARi. An improvement of previous project - Room

name: P-YNPM
description: An organization that contains all of the packages I wrote to solve my own problem

name: adonis-os-blog
description: Adonis OS Blog - The abandoned blog

name: adonix-blog
description: Personal Blog - Remake of Adonis OS Blog

name: gitignored
description: .gitignore template generator taken from GitHub itself

name: MinimalTicTacToe
description: A Simple AI TicTacToe made with React + TypeScript and Styled-Components for fun. Choose against AI or human. You can play in 3x3 grid up to 5x5. game for fun.

name: AndroidSimpleAIChess
description: First Android Project - Parallel AI Chess Game. Choose against AI from Level 1 to Level 10. You can play against your friend as well.

name: LibGDX-Chess-Game
description: A Parallel AI Chess Game made with LibGDX Framework to make the game playable on many devices. Choose against AI from Level 1 to Level 10. You can play against your friend as well.

name: SimpleParallelChessAI
description: A Parallel AI Chess Game made with Java Swing. Choose against AI from Level 1 to Level 10. You can play against your friend as well.

name: TextEditor
description: A Simple Text Editor similar to NotePad. I wrote this because the undo option of Notepad can only undo once. But with this software you can undo all of your edit.

name: TextEditorFX
description: A Simple Text Editor similar to NotePad. My first JavaFX project. I wrote this as an upgraded version of the previous TextEditor.

name: TicTacToe
description: Simple AI Tic-Tac-Toe Game made with Java Swing. Choose against AI or human. You can play in 3x3 grid up to 10x10.
